name: evidence01.mpg
description:
An abandoned, haunting place full of unsettling things seems to have something really nasty going on. You're totally convinced that something is out of hand and you have to find enough evidence to prove it.

Download the first version of the demo for free.

How to beat it?

Unlock the doors by using the light switch on the wall at the end of the corridor. Solve the puzzle or use this number (263827) in the safebox.
